    • Method Detail

      • openListRanking

        public static void openListRanking(java.lang.String csvfile)
        get the information of the file
        the number of candidates, parties, the ballots
        store the information in the dictionary
        candidatesmap store the name of candidates and the ballots he gets
        inner store the name of candidates and the parties he is from
        arrayparty stores the party of the corresponding candidates

        Parameters:
        csvfile - the input file

      • auditfileopl

        public static void auditfileopl()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        generate an audit file for OPL voting
        The general information will be in the audit file:
        1). The number of seats, ballots, candidates
        2). The raw data
        3). The sorted data
        4). The candidates who get the seats
        5). The winner
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the file could't be created

      • sendtomediaopl

        public static void sendtomediaopl()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        generate a file which is sent to media
        The general information will be in the audit file:
        1). The number of seats, ballots, candidates
        2). The sorted data
        3). The candidates who get the seats
        4). The winner
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the file could't be created

      • displayResultopl

        public static void displayResultopl()
        show the results to the termianl
        The general information will be in the audit file:
        1). The number of seats, ballots, candidates
        2). The winner

      • generateSummaryOPL

        public static void generateSummaryOPL()
        the function generates the summary of the election
        the function does not return anything

      • breaktieOPL

        public static int breaktieOPL(int j)
        if there are candidates who get the same number of ballots
        we need to break a tie
        this function works for generate the random number

        Parameters:
        j - the length of winners' list
        Returns:
        the random generated integer

      • showWinner

        public static java.lang.String showWinner()
        for the OPL list ballot
        get the ones who get the most ballots,
        break tie if necessary

        Returns:
        String
